api_list.name: Getsinglecountryandunicodeflag
api_list.description: get a single country with its flag in unicode format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-cities1.p.rapidapi.com/flag/unicode"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-cities1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
